headline.main: 7 Vie for Sullivan Award for Best Amateur Athlete

snippet: The world gymnastics champion Simone Biles, the Heisman Trophy winner Derrick Henry of Alabama and the Connecticut basketball star Breanna Stewart are among seven finalists for the Sullivan Award that honors the nation’s best amateur athlete.
lead_paragraph: The world gymnastics champion Simone Biles, the Heisman Trophy winner Derrick Henry of Alabama and the Connecticut basketball star Breanna Stewart are among seven finalists for the Sullivan Award that honors the nation’s best amateur athlete.
